entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy in the afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
